nodes.text: Xet was a Falleen female member of the Black Sun criminal syndicate. Between 3 ABY and 4 ABY, Xet attended the Auction for Han Solo that was hosted by the resurgent criminal syndicate Crimson Dawn on the planet Jekara. Prior to the beginning of the auction, Xet spoke with Crae, a former member of the Sixth Kin syndicate, when Doctor Chelli Aphra attempted to steal a necklace worn by Xet that included three data crystals. The attempt failed, however, and Xet was forced to clean up drink spoiled on her clothing by Aphra.
